s.text: "I think that would be the only way for an 8-year-old child to hear such a name," Culeman-Beckman told Chatterbox.
But when pressed, Culeman-Beckman admitted that Jacob Bernstein hadn't said that Carl Bernstein actually told him Deep Throat was Mark Felt.
Ephron says that "Carl never told me who Deep Throat was, which was very smart because I would have told the whole world by now."
Ephron says that "Carl never told me who Deep Throat was, which was very smart because I would have told the whole world by now."
Ephron says that "Carl never told me who Deep Throat was, which was very smart because I would have told the whole world by now."
Nixon: You know what I'd do with him, the bastard?
Culeman-Beckman says that 11 years ago he attended Hampton Day School Camp in Bridgehampton, Long Island with Carl Bernstein's sons, Jacob and Max, and that Jacob was the one who told him.
Daley did better than wonder: In a story published in Wednesday's Courant , Daley tracked the 85-year-old Felt down in California and asked him if he was Deep Throat.
